hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that the Prophet said:"Any man who pollinates a date-palm tree then sells it, the fruits of the tree are for the one who pollinated it, unless the purchaser stipulated otherwise

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّخْلِ يُبَاعُ أَصْلُهَا وَيَسْتَثْنِي الْمُشْتَرِي ثَمَرَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Selling A Tree But Not Its Produce
